detail_desc: Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a jacquard pattern.
All-in-one suit in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
All-in-one suit in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, concealed zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Short dress in soft cotton jersey with decorative buttons down the front and a wide, frill-trimmed square neckline with concealed elastication. Elasticated seam under the bust and short puff sleeves with a small frill trim.

Short dress in soft cotton jersey with decorative buttons down the front and a wide, frill-trimmed square neckline with concealed elastication. Elasticated seam under the bust and short puff sleeves with a small frill trim.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a felted wool blend. Extended waistband with a button, zip fly and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. The wool content of the trousers is recycled.

Suit trousers in a felted wool blend. Extended waistband with a button, zip fly and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-up hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. The wool content of the trousers is recycled.

Suit trousers in a softly draping weave made from a wool blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and adjustable tabs with a metal fastener at the sides. Zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-ups at the hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a softly draping weave made from a wool blend with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and adjustable tabs with a metal fastener at the sides. Zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-ups at the hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a woven viscose blend with an elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a woven viscose blend with an elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a woven viscose blend with an elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated, lace-trimmed tops.
Short-sleeved dress in organic cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Gathers in the sides for best fit.
Baby Exclusive. Collar in a soft, double weave made from organic cotton. The collar is in the shape of a flounce and has an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Short, A-line skirt in soft slub jersey. High waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim at the top.
Wide T-shirt in striped jersey made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and a rounded hem.
Wide T-shirt in striped jersey made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and a rounded hem.
Wide T-shirt in striped jersey made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a lace-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover. Elasticated seam below the bust and detachable twisted ties with tassels.
Sleeveless top in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a lace-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover. Elasticated seam below the bust and detachable twisted ties with tassels.
Long, off-the-shoulder dress in pleated chiffon with elastication and a double flounce at the top and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft cable knit. Hat with a double-layered ribbed hem and pompom on top. Scarf with rib-knit short sides.
Set with a hat and scarf in a soft cable knit. Hat with a double-layered ribbed hem and pompom on top. Scarf with rib-knit short sides.
Short, straight-cut blouse in a linen weave with a wide neckline, covered buttons down the front and long balloon sleeves.
Short, fitted blouse in a viscose weave with a low V-neck, covered buttons at the front, smocking at the back and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Metal rings. One smooth ring and eight in various designs.
Metal rings. One smooth ring and eight in various designs.

Wide dress in airy chiffon crêpe with a frilled collar and V-neck with a drawstring at the top. Wide, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a skirt with gathered tiers ending in a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Wide dress in airy chiffon crêpe with a frilled collar and V-neck with a drawstring at the top. Wide, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a skirt with gathered tiers ending in a flounce at the hem. Lined.

Wide dress in airy chiffon crêpe with a frilled collar and V-neck with a drawstring at the top. Wide, raglan balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a skirt with gathered tiers ending in a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in an organic cotton weave with smocking and elastication at the waist. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in an organic cotton weave with smocking and elastication at the waist. Lined.
Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with smocking at the top and a sweetheart neckline. Shoulder straps with elastication at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorter-style blouse in an airy cotton weave with a wide neckline, concealed press-studs down the front and tiered flounces at the top and down the sleeves.

Wide shirt in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, pearly buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets with a button, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated, patterned weave with a visible, ribbed elastic waistband. Jersey lining.

Ankle-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a seam, gathers and slit at the front. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. V-neck slipover in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton with ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Three-strand necklace of metal chains in various designs with coin-shaped pendants and plastic beads. Adjustable length 45-53 cm.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a print motif and appliqués on the front. Buttons on the shoulders, press-studs at the crotch and short legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with plastic studs at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with plastic studs at the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with plastic studs at the top.
Trousers in a stretch linen weave with a regular waist, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Cotton jersey waist panel for best fit.

Super push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide elastic hem.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal rings in various shapes and designs.
Metal rings in various shapes and designs.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a wrapover front and press-studs at one side and at the crotch. Trousers with an elasticated waist.

Long, sleeveless dress in an airy, patterned jacquard weave. Narrow cut at the top with an elasticated neckline and short shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow at one side. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Satin lining.

Short skirt in airy, pleated chiffon with a high, elasticated waist and sewn-in tie belt. Satin lining.

Knee-length skirt in lightweight cotton twill. High waist with a belt, zip fly, hook-and-eye fastening and large patch pockets. Unlined.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured weave with a sheen. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, and side pockets. Unlined.

Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend. Ribbed shaft with an intarsia motif and elasticated tops.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. The base layer is designed with the minimal number of seams for a more comfortable fit.
